snippet: Gary Oldman, the Academy Award-nominated star of "Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy" (among many other films) and director of "Nil By Mouth," will try his hand at overseeing a live online broadcast of Jack White's April 27 concert at Webster Hall in...
abstract: Gary Oldman, the Academy Award-nominated star of "Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy" (among many other films) and director of "Nil By Mouth," will try his hand at overseeing a live online broadcast of Jack White's April 27 concert at Webster Hall in Manhattan.

headline.main: Gary Oldman to Direct Jack White Concert Webcast
headline.print_headline: Oldman to Direct Jack White Webcast
